snippet: A Burmese immigrant is being held on three counts of murder in the stabbing deaths of three brothers, ages 1, 5 and 12, in their home in New Bern, a coastal town that is home to about 1,900 Burmese refugees.
abstract: Burmese immigrant Eh Lar Doh Htoo is being held on three counts of murder in stabbing deaths of three brothers, ages 1, 5 and 12, in their home in New Bern, NC; motive for attack is unknown.
lead_paragraph: A Burmese immigrant is being held on three counts of murder in the stabbing deaths of three brothers, ages 1, 5 and 12, in their home in New Bern, a coastal town that is home to about 1,900 Burmese refugees.

headline.main: North Carolina: 3 Children Stabbed to Death
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: 3 Children Stabbed to Death
